title: 6g does not write errors to stderr
body:
by **jesse9jones**: 
The 6g version release.r56 9441 compiler writes error messages to stdout instead of
stderr. This makes it harder than it should be to write tools to process the error
messages (instead of just saving stderr and groveling through that for errors they have
to save stdout as well which can be much much larger).

This was for 6G on Mac OS X via macports.
